FOR ONLINE PUBLICATION FIGURE A1: DISTRIBUTION OF LOAN TYPES FOR FIRMS INCLUDED AND EXCLUDED FROM KHWAJA AND MIAN (2008)-STYLE ESTIMATION This figure plots the distribution of loan type for borrowers with multiple lenders in a given quarter (KM sample) and for single lender borrowers. The idea is to understand whether the estimates in the KM-style approach are based on a sample with a similar distribution of loan types as in the sample of single lender borrowers. We first compute the distribution for each year in the sample and then take the average across years.
